front.title: Extending the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Reason Header for Applications

abstract.t: This document defines a new protocol value "Application" for theReason Header field and a new IANA Registry for registeringapplication types. This new value enables signaling that a requestor response has been issued as a result of a decision made by aparticular type of application or that an initial request has beenretargeted as a result of an application decision.
